
---
title: '京东超级补贴再来：PLUS 速领 600_300 元大额券（可叠万券）'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/031bec79-c5e6-433a-b7f1-a452b907f4c7.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 08 Nov 2021 02:13:36 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/031bec79-c5e6-433a-b7f1-a452b907f4c7.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="1a96">11 月 8 日京东再次开启“PLUS 会员超级补贴”特惠活动，仅限今日！</p><p data-vmark="21de">会场内 PLUS 会员可领 6800-600、3800-300、1400-120、500-40 元超级补贴券各一张，<span class="accentTextColor">可叠加万券使用</span>：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此领券</a>。</p><p data-vmark="c7c0">超级补贴券仅限今天使用，过期失效，</p><p data-vmark="373f"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/11/031bec79-c5e6-433a-b7f1-a452b907f4c7.png" w="730" h="402" title="京东超级补贴再来：PLUS 速领 600/300 元大额券（可叠万券）" width="730" height="402" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7cf1">“PLUS 会员超级补贴券”可与头号京贴、全品类东券、限品类东券、店铺东券、满减活动、京享红包叠加，<span class="accentTextColor">按照平行优惠规则使用。</span></p><h2 data-vmark="4e7d">超级补贴券后好价单品</h2><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank"
